column2: Displayed are Enterococcus counts.  The maximum daily limit is 104 counts/100 mL
A swimming advisory is declared by the DCR for the following day if counts exceed 104
counts/100 mL or if the 5-day running geometric mean exceeds 35 counts/100 mL
Daily rainfall totals from Logan Airport, National Weather Service raingauge
All results are in counts/100 mL and testing is performed by DCR.
Pleasure Bay is sampled once per week, with resampling the following day if bacteria counts are elevated.
